about_the_game:
Includes the costumes and music of the colorful cast of characters from TEKKEN 7! Also includes TEKKEN 7 battle UI and exclusive titles!

Includes:
• 19 TEKKEN 7 Character Costumes
• 20 TEKKEN 7 BGM Tracks
• TEKKEN 7 Battle UI
• 2 TEKKEN 7 Collaboration Titles

Note: Character customization is not supported while TEKKEN 7 costumes are equiped
detailed_description:
Includes the costumes and music of the colorful cast of characters from TEKKEN 7! Also includes TEKKEN 7 battle UI and exclusive titles!

Includes:
• 19 TEKKEN 7 Character Costumes
• 20 TEKKEN 7 BGM Tracks
• TEKKEN 7 Battle UI
• 2 TEKKEN 7 Collaboration Titles

Note: Character customization is not supported while TEKKEN 7 costumes are equiped
name: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. - TEKKEN 7 Collaboration Pack DLC

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. - TEKKEN 7 Collaboration Pack DLC - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. - TEKKEN 7 Collaboration Pack DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 1903 (OS Build 18362)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600, 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB or Intel Arc A380, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: 1080p Low @ 60 FPS w/ Balanced FSR 1.0, requires a CPU which supports the AVX and SSE4.2 instruction set
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 1903 (OS Build 18362)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790, 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 6750, 12 GB or Intel Arc A770, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: 4K High @ 60 FPS w/ Quality FSR or DLSS, requires a CPU which supports the AVX and SSE4.2 instruction set

short_description: The TEKKEN 7 Collaboration Pack includes the costumes and music of the colorful cast of characters from TEKKEN 7! Also includes TEKKEN 7 battle UI and exclusive titles!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
